title: Dream1.Channeler.Start
body:
Don't be afraid
you can trust me
"I don't"
What's happened to you, your reaction to the crystals
the new powers you have, to heal and harm
the dreams, like this
just listen to me for a moment
"is this a trick?"
No, it's no trick
we were able to sense your being a few days ago
"Who's we?"
- Oh, a coven of other channelers, like you
Can you tell us where you are?
"I'm a slave in a crystal mine"
"Somewhere in the basin mountains, I'm not sure"
"Haven't looked at a map in a while"
Oh, oh. Oh dear.
We cannot help you right now
"why's that?"
"I knew it, this is a joke"
"Fuck you"
<<returnToCampScene DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
